name: FruitSalad
description:
Collect fruit to win the game

Avoid traps

Kill enemies by jumping on their heads

WASD / Arrow keys to move

Simple controls, challenging gameplay

Project inspired by  Rob Brooks' "Making a 2D Platformer" course, links below

https://twitter.com/RobBCreates

https://www.skillshare.com/classes/UE4-Making-a-2D-Platformer-With-Unreal-Engine...
